name: TI Connect Backup File
summary: Learn about .TIG files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: TIG files can be used for restoring the factory installation state if programs are accidentally deleted. Consult the TI website to acquire the appropriate file for your calculator version.
A TIG file can be opened by programs that can open .ZIP files, such as Smith Micro StuffIt Expander.
NOTE: TIG files support TI devices such as the TI-83 and TI-84 series calculators.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
